title: Bluetooth Health Profile (part of Bluetooth 4.0 BLE) external sensors interface
body: There are more and more external sensors, not only medical, but all kind of proximity stuff for watches, smart apliances, cars, and innumerable industrial applications that would pen the door to thousands of new apps. As usual Microsoft is late in this too, and so we have to focus development on iOS and android that have the SDK up to date with technology.
